entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Renfrew
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 07:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -20.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -22.3°C
Wind: WNW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 22 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
